languages.text: Джай намекнула, что была бы рада получить от Лорд-капитана подарок, достойный связавших их отношений. Для Вольного Торговца нетрудно раздобыть почти что угодно — достаточно лишь повелеть Высокому фактотуму предоставить это. Но вот в вопросе выбора {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости придется положиться на себя... или советы членов своей свиты.

Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.
languages.original_text: Джай намекнула, что была бы рада получить от Лорд-капитана подарок, достойный связавших их отношений. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

languages.text: Jae a laissé entendre qu'elle serait ravie de recevoir un cadeau digne de leur relation de la part {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} peut se procurer tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} désire ou presque, il lui suffit de demander au haut factotum de s'en occuper. Pour le choix du présent, en revanche, Sa Seigneurie devra s'en remettre à son propre jugement... ou aux conseils des membres de son entourage.
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Jae a laissé entendre qu'elle serait ravie de recevoir un cadeau digne de leur relation de la part {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} peut se procurer tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} désire ou presque, il lui suffit de demander au haut factotum de s'en occuper. Pour le choix du présent, en revanche, Sa Seigneurie devra s'en remettre à son propre jugement... ou aux conseils des membres de son entourage.

languages.text: 根据婕伊的暗示，如果能收到来自行商浪人的礼物，她会非常开心。这件礼物需要配得上两人的关系，但对行商浪人而言，无论是什么样的礼物，都是小事一桩，只要命令高阶顾问去置办就行了。至于要选择怎样的礼物，行商浪人恐怕只能依靠{mf|他|她}自己的智慧……或是随行人员的建议。
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: 根据婕伊的暗示，如果能收到来自行商浪人的礼物，她会非常开心。这件礼物需要配得上两人的关系，但对行商浪人而言，无论是什么样的礼物，都是小事一桩，只要命令高阶顾问去置办就行了。至于要选择怎样的礼物，行商浪人恐怕只能依靠{mf|他|她}自己的智慧……或是随行人员的建议。

languages.text: ジェイは、ロード・キャプテンから二人の関係にふさわしい贈り物を受け取れたなら嬉しいとほのめかしている。自由開拓者にとって、どんなものであろうと調達すること自体は大したことではない。ハイ・ファクトタムに命令するだけで済むからである。しかし贈り物を選ぶとなると、陛下は己の洞察力に頼るか…もしくは従者の助言を当てにしなければならないだろう。
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: ジェイは、ロード・キャプテンから二人の関係にふさわしい贈り物を受け取れたなら嬉しいとほのめかしている。自由開拓者にとって、どんなものであろうと調達すること自体は大したことではない。ハイ・ファクトタムに命令するだけで済むからである。しかし贈り物を選ぶとなると、陛下は己の洞察力に頼るか…もしくは従者の助言を当てにしなければならないだろう。

languages.text: Jae hat angedeutet, dass sie entzückt wäre, ein Geschenk vom Lord Captain zu erhalten, das der Beziehung der beiden würdig ist. {mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} kann mühelos so gut wie alles beschaffen. {mf|Er|Sie} muss es lediglich dem Hoch-Faktotum befehlen. Bei der Wahl des Geschenks muss {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} sich aber auf {mf|seinen|ihren} eigenen Scharfsinn verlassen ... oder den Rat der Mitglieder {mf|seines|ihres} Gefolges.
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Jae hat angedeutet, dass sie entzückt wäre, ein Geschenk vom Lord Captain zu erhalten, das der Beziehung der beiden würdig ist. {mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} kann mühelos so gut wie alles beschaffen. {mf|Er|Sie} muss es lediglich dem Hoch-Faktotum befehlen. Bei der Wahl des Gifts muss {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} sich aber auf {mf|seinen|ihren} eigenen Scharfsinn verlassen ... oder den Rat der Mitglieder {mf|seines|ihres} Gefolges.

languages.text: Jae ha indicado que le alegraría recibir un regalo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que sea digno de la relación que comparten. Para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, conseguir cualquier cosa es una futesa: solo tiene que encargárselo a su Sumo Factótum. En cuanto a la elección del regalo, tendrá que valerse de su propia astucia... o del consejo de los miembros de su séquito.
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Jae ha indicado que le alegraría recibir un regalo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que sea digno de la relación que comparten. Para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, conseguir cualquier cosa es una futesa: solo tiene que encargárselo a su Sumo Factótum. En cuanto a la elección del regalo, tendrá que valerse de su propia astucia... o del consejo de los miembros de su séquito.

languages.text: Jae, Lord Kaptan'dan aralarındaki ilişkiye layık bir hediye almaktan çok mutlu olacağını laf arasında çıtlattı. Bir Hür Tacir'in her istediğini temin etmesi çok kolaydır, emrini Arşıkâhya'ya iletmesi yeterlidir. Hediye seçmek konusu ise bambaşka. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu konuda kendi sezgilerine güvenmek veya maiyetindekilere danışmak durumunda.
languages.original_text: Jae has hinted that she would be delighted to receive a gift from the Lord Captain that was worthy of the relationship the two of them share. For a Rogue Trader, procuring just about anything is a trifle — all it takes is commanding the High Factotum to do just that. As for choosing the gift, however, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will have to rely on {mf|his|her} own acumen... or the counsel of members of {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Jae laf arasında Lord Kaptan'dan, aralarındaki ilişkiye layık bir hediye almaktan çok mutlu olacağını çıtlattı. Bir Hür Tacir için herhangi bir şey temin etmek son derece basittir, emrini Arşıkâhya'ya iletmesi yeterlidir. Hediye seçmek konusu ise başka. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri bu konuda kendi sezgilerine güvenmek durumunda. Maiyetindekilere danışmak veyahut da.
